description:
Tensions mount as the candidates prepare for the debut, but little do they know what http://anidb.net/ch115875 [Edward] has in store. As the debut proceeds, http://anidb.net/ch114347 [Kate] and http://anidb.net/ch114347 [Emilyko] struggle amid the more competitive candidates. Who will rise to the top, and who will be discarded?
Source: Funimation
